Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Model.Station

Class CardSchema

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Model.Station.CardSchema
class CardSchema extends Object
Manages card schema of the Station.

  • Field Details

    • cardSchema

      private final PlayableCard[][] cardSchema
      Card schema: a grid where each slot can be null (no card placed there) or have a PlayableCard

    • cardOverlap

      private final int[][] cardOverlap
      Each non-zero slot corresponds to a slot in cardSchema where a PlayableCard has been placed. Each box contains the sequential number of cards already placed in cardSchema plus 1

    • currentCount

      private int currentCount
      Current number of placed cards

    • cardPosition

      private final HashMap<PlayableCard,Tuple<Integer,Integer>> cardPosition
      Hashmap used to get coords in the grid of a PlayableCard

  • Constructor Details

    • CardSchema

      CardSchema()
      This constructor builds a card schema instance

  • Method Details

    • cardOverAnchor

      boolean cardOverAnchor(PlayableCard anchor, Direction dir) throws InvalidCardException
      This method checks if there is a card over the anchor in Direction dir Throws InvalidCardException is the anchor doesn't exist in schema.
      Parameters:
      anchor - the PlayableCard used as anchor
      dir - the Direction in which card has to be placed
      Returns:
      true if and only if there is card ver the anchor in Direction dir
      Throws:
      InvalidCardException - if station doesn't have the card to place.

    • checkCoords

      private boolean checkCoords(int x, int y)
      This method checks if (x, y) are available coords inside the matrix
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate
      y - the y-coordinate
      Returns:
      true if and only if (x, y) are valid coordinates

    • getCardWithAnchor

      Optional<PlayableCard> getCardWithAnchor(PlayableCard anchor, Direction dir) throws InvalidCardException
      This method returns an optional of card placed from the anchor in the specified direction; optional is empty if this card doesn't exist.
      Parameters:
      anchor - the anchor from which the method starts searching
      dir - the direction of the search
      Returns:
      Optional<PlayableCard> describing the card
      Throws:
      InvalidCardException - if station doesn't have the card to place.

    • placeInitialCard

      void placeInitialCard(PlayableCard initialCard)
      This method place initial card in CardSchema
      Parameters:
      initialCard - the initial card to place

    • isPlaceable

      boolean isPlaceable(PlayableCard anchor, Direction direction) throws InvalidAnchorException
      This method checks if a card (even if it isn't visible in the station) can be placed in CardSchema
      Parameters:
      anchor - the PlayableCard used as anchor
      direction - the Direction n which card has to be placed
      Returns:
      true if and only if card is in station and is placeable in CardSchema.
      Throws:
      InvalidAnchorException - if the anchor isn't in card schema.

    • placeCard

      void placeCard(PlayableCard anchor, PlayableCard toPlace, Direction direction)
      This method place a card in CardSchema if it's placeable in CardSchema If the card has been placed it updates station's points and visible symbols. Then updates cards in hand.
      Parameters:
      anchor - the PlayableCard used as anchor
      toPlace - the PlayableCard to place
      direction - the Direction in which card has to be placed

    • getLastPlaced

      Optional<PlayableCard> getLastPlaced()
      This method returns an optional of card containing the last placed card; optional is empty if no cards has been placed.
      Returns:
      Optional<PlayableCard> describing the last placed card

    • cardIsInSchema

      boolean cardIsInSchema(PlayableCard card)
      This method checks if card has been placed
      Parameters:
      card - the card to search for
      Returns:
      true if and only if the card has been placed.

    • getCardSchema

      Optional<String>[][] getCardSchema()
      This method returns the schema where each card is described by its name Optional is empty if in (x, y) there is no card
      Returns:
      a String matrix with all the visible cards codes.

    • getCardOrientation

      Optional<CardOrientation>[][] getCardOrientation()
      This method returns orientation of each card in the schema. Optional is empty if in (x, y) there is no card
      Returns:
      a String matrix with all the visible cards codes.

    • getCardOverlap

      int[][] getCardOverlap()
      This method returns a matrix with 0 if in (x, y) there's no card otherwise a sequential number representing the order of card placing. If getCardOverlap()[x][y] > getCardOverlap()[i][j] then card in position [x][y] has been placed after card in position [i][j]
      Returns:
      an integer matrix representing current overlapping situation

    • countPattern

      int countPattern(ArrayList<Tuple<Integer,Integer>> moves, ArrayList<Symbol> requiredSymbol)
      This method returns the number of specified pattern in card schema
      Parameters:
      moves - the Arraylist of movement inside card schema
      requiredSymbol - the ArrayList of required seeds of each card in the pattern
      Returns:
      the number of the specified pattern found

    • getPlacedCardSequence

      public List<Tuple<PlayableCard,Tuple<Integer,Integer>>> getPlacedCardSequence()
      Getter for placed card sequence
      Returns:
      a List<Tuple<PlayableCard, Tuple<Integer, Integer>>>
